value.desc: Model of the component of type { min, max } (both values must be between global min/max); Either use this property (along with a listener for 'input' event) OR use v-model directive

step.desc: Specify step amount between valid values (> 0.0); When step equals to 0 it defines infinite granularity

drag-range.desc: User can drag range instead of just the two thumbs

drag-range-only.desc: User can drag only the range instead and NOT the two thumbs

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

label.desc: Popup labels (for left and right thumbs) when user clicks/taps on the slider thumb and moves it

label-color.desc: Color name for labels background from the Quasar Color Palette; Applies to both labels, unless specific label color props are used

left-label-color.desc: Color name for left label background from the Quasar Color Palette

right-label-color.desc: Color name for right label background from the Quasar Color Palette

markers.desc: Display markers on the track, one for each possible value for the model

snap.desc: Snap thumbs on valid values, rather than sliding freely; Suggestion: use with 'step' prop

dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

input.desc: Emitted when component's model changes; Is also used by v-model

change.desc: Emitted on lazy model value change (after user slides then releases thumb)
